Example of Spam Message Forwarded Through Hopkins SMTP Server

The message should be read from bottom up. The To: field indicates a jhu.edu address, but forwarding is performed to Commedia. 

From new-life4u.com@operationink.com Wed Feb 28 17:48:14 2007
Return-path: <new-life4u.com@operationink.com>
Envelope-to: yairamir@cnds.jhu.edu
Delivery-date: Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:48:14 -0500
Received: from blaze.cs.jhu.edu ([128.220.13.50])
        by commedia.cnds.jhu.edu with esmtp (Exim 4.66)
        (envelope-from <new-life4u.com@operationink.com>)
        id 1HMXam-0002n8-Gb
        for yairamir@cnds.jhu.edu; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:48:14 -0500
Received: from jhmin1.jhmi.edu (jhmin1.jhmi.edu [162.129.8.64])
        by blaze.cs.jhu.edu (8.13.7/8.13.7) with ESMTP id l1SMlxYN002668
        for <yairamir@cs.jhu.edu>; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:48:02 -0500 (EST)
Received: from ipex12.johnshopkins.edu
 (ipex12.johnshopkins.edu [162.129.8.143]) by jhmin1.jhmi.edu
 (Sun Java System Messaging Server 6.1 HotFix 0.02 (built Aug 25 2004))
 with ESMTPS id <0JE700GTF3B5D600@jhmin1.jhmi.edu> for yairamir@cs.jhu.edu
        (envelope-from <new-life4u.com@operationink.com>)
        id 1HMXam-0002n8-Gb
        for yairamir@cnds.jhu.edu; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:48:14 -0500
Received: from jhmin1.jhmi.edu (jhmin1.jhmi.edu [162.129.8.64])
        by blaze.cs.jhu.edu (8.13.7/8.13.7) with ESMTP id l1SMlxYN002668
        for <yairamir@cs.jhu.edu>; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:48:02 -0500 (EST)
Received: from ipex12.johnshopkins.edu
 (ipex12.johnshopkins.edu [162.129.8.143]) by jhmin1.jhmi.edu
 (Sun Java System Messaging Server 6.1 HotFix 0.02 (built Aug 25 2004))
 with ESMTPS id <0JE700GTF3B5D600@jhmin1.jhmi.edu> for yairamir@cs.jhu.edu
 (ORCPT yairamir@jhu.edu); Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:47:59 -0500 (EST)
Received: from unknown (HELO ipex2.johnshopkins.edu) ([84.76.223.93])
 by ipex12.johnshopkins.edu with ESMTP/TLS/RC4-SHA; Wed,
 28 Feb 2007 17:47:57 -0500
Received: from unknown (HELO localhost) ([84.76.223.93])
 by ipex2.johnshopkins.edu with SMTP; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 17:46:41 -0500
Date: Wed, 28 Feb 2007 23:46:15 +0100
From: Josiah Mitchell <new-life4u.com@operationink.com>
Subject: [SPAM] [ JH-SUSP SPAM ][ JHSPAM-ALERT ] 75% discount
To: yairamir@jhu.edu
